channel.title: Soundtrack - correct track order
channel.description:
Hi,
Sorry if this has been raised before but I can't find anything on the forum.
Can somebody post the correct running order for the soundtrack.
thanks

item.title: Soundtrack - correct track order
item.dc:creator: Spudz
item.description:
@GalaxySwift yeah, I was thinking of changing mine to that.
I think I will now that I’ve played the game and seen where the music is used.

Read full topic

item.title: Soundtrack - correct track order
item.dc:creator: Spudz
item.description:
This is how I’ve put it in my library:

  1. Black Mesa Theme
  2. Inbound Part 1
  3. Inbound Part 2
  4. Inbound art 3
  5. Anomalous Materials
  6. Unforeseen Consequences
  7. Office Complex
  8. We’ve Got Hostiles
  9. Blast Pit 1
  10. Blast Pit 2
  11. Blast Pit 3
  12. Power Up
  13. On a Rail 1
  14. On a Rail 2
  15. Apprehension
  16. Residue Processing
  17. Questionable Ethics 1
  18. Questionable Ethics 2
  19. Surface Tension 1
  20. Surface Tension 2
  21. Surface Tension 3
  22. Surface Tension 4
  23. Forget About Freeman
  24. Lambda Core
  25. End Credits Part 1
  26. End Credits Part 2
  27. Office Complex (Mesa Remix)
  28. Blast Pit 2 (Mesa Remix)
  29. Apprehension (Mesa Remix)
  30. Black Mesa Theme (Mesa Remix)
  31. Missile Launch (Cut track from On a Rail)

Read full topic

item.title: Soundtrack - correct track order
item.dc:creator: GalaxySwift
item.description:
I have them in this order:

This is based on the order of the chapters. I also put the mesa mix of the main theme at the end for good measure, but there’s really no “correct” running order.

Read full topic
